TopicTitle: What does 1.1 mean in terms of part balance?

Articles.Content:
Did we already get some news if there are changes to the balance, especially around engines?

Last patches changed a lot, creating an interesting dynamic centered around Career, and less around sandbox. E.g. early 1.25 engines being less efficient, but cheap engines, 2.5m stuff creating a spike in cost, and aerospike/ssme-alike becoming expensive but efficient late-game equipment.

Edited March 6, 2016 by Temeter
I heard they changed something about MPL, and parts in asteroid day (minus telescope) will be added wheels changed,

Yeah, I've heard about asteroid day stuff being adapted and added to the main game, that's what made me wonder about the other parts of the game. I think there was something in a devnote about squad doing further balancing work.

I just want some ridiculously heavy parts to be balanced the mk1-2 cockpit is even heavier than his mk3 lovely personerpart (also mk3 has more seats) seriously we need to see real part balance this update
Well, most Mk3 designs (at least my Mk3 aircraft will be) will look.. rather ugly after new landing gear comes and the current medium size ones will become two-wheeled landing gear.
